attributes.action: Withdraw the Court of Appeal action to reduce the amount of Compensation awarded to injured service men and women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Ministry of Defence (MoD) has gone to the Court of Appeal to try to significantly reduce the compensation awarded to two injured soldiers.

We believe this action should cease and the scheme remain unchanged.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
